JobFullDesc: This role will be a key part of the India & South Asia Marketplace & Categories team for Auto/TukTuks. This team is responsible for day to day marketplace management & execution, key spend & incentive decisions as well as strategic projects to grow and develop the 3W category. What will you do? * Provide forensics and insights on daily/weekly movements of various marketplace metrics and recommendations on tactical decisions to manage growth, reliability & profitability* Manage end to end strategic projects related to marketplace investments or category growth including platform rider strategy as well as profitability* Liaison with functional teams like rider/driver operations to include/customize Auto in any process/strategic initiatives* New product feature rollouts & strategic input to product strategy* Provide support on financial/operational planning & forecasting What will you need?* Excellent spoken & written communication and organization skills.* Strong Data-driven decision-making mentality and Problem Solving skills* Ability to handle Cross functional projects & initiatives with multiple regional & global stakeholders* Good Excel/ data management skills and SQL experience
